IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. REDIS-WORKER.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 INCOMING-DATA.
          05 REDIS-CHANNEL PIC X(30).
          05 MESSAGE-BODY PIC X(500).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       RECEIVE-REDIS-MESSAGE.
           ACCEPT INCOMING-DATA FROM SYSIN
           PERFORM PROCESS-CHANNEL-MESSAGE
           DISPLAY "Redis worker completed".

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. CUSTOMER-LOOKUP.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 CUSTOMER-KEY PIC X(10).
       01 CACHE-STATUS PIC 9(2).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           MOVE '1234567890' TO CUSTOMER-KEY
           CALL 'REDIS-GET' USING CUSTOMER-KEY CACHE-STATUS
           IF CACHE-STATUS = 00
               DISPLAY 'Customer found in cache'
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'Customer not cached'
           END-IF
           STOP RUN.

       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.

       PROCEDURE DIVISION.

           READ CACHE-CONFIG-FILE.
           CLOSE CACHE-CONFIG-FILE.
           STOP RUN.

       01 PRODUCT-INFO.
          05 PRODUCT-ID PIC 9(6).
          05 PRODUCT-NAME PIC X(50).
          05 PRICE PIC 9(6)V99.
       01 DATASOURCE-NAME PIC X(20) VALUE 'INVENTORY_DS'.

           DELETE FROM PRODUCTS
           WHERE PRODUCT_ID = :PRODUCT-ID
       END-EXEC.

       PROGRAM-ID. INVENTORY-GRPC-SERVICE.
       DATA DIVISION.

       01 WS-STOCK-LEVEL PIC 9(8).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.

           PERFORM UNTIL EXIT-FLAG = 'Y'
               CALL 'GRPC-LISTEN-FOR-REQUEST' USING WS-INVENTORY-REQUEST
               PERFORM CHECK-INVENTORY-LEVEL
               PERFORM SEND-STOCK-RESPONSE
           END-PERFORM.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. UDP-SERVER-MAIN.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-SERVER-SOCKET PIC 9(8).
       01 WS-CLIENT-MESSAGE PIC X(256).
       01 WS-CLIENT-IP PIC X(15).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       START-SERVER.
           MOVE 7777 TO WS-SERVER-SOCKET
           CALL 'CREATE-UDP-SERVER' USING WS-SERVER-SOCKET
           CALL 'UDP-BIND' USING WS-SERVER-SOCKET '0.0.0.0'
           PERFORM UNTIL 1 = 0
               CALL 'UDP-RECVFROM' USING WS-SERVER-SOCKET
                                        WS-CLIENT-MESSAGE
                                        WS-CLIENT-IP
           END-PERFORM.

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. SOCKET-CLIENT.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 TCP-SOCKET-HANDLE PIC 9(8) COMP.
       01 SERVER-ADDRESS PIC X(50) VALUE '192.168.1.100'.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       CALL 'SOCKET' USING TCP-SOCKET-HANDLE
                          BY CONTENT 2
                          BY CONTENT 1
                          BY CONTENT 6.
       CALL 'CONNECT' USING TCP-SOCKET-HANDLE
                           BY REFERENCE SERVER-ADDRESS
                           BY CONTENT 8080.
       STOP RUN.

code_snippet:
<?php
class MessageConsumer {
    public function consume($message) {
        $redis = Redis::connection();
        $processedKey = "processed_msg_" . $message->getId();
        if ($redis->exists($processedKey)) {
            return false;
        }
        $this->processMessage($message);
        $redis->setex($processedKey, 3600, 'true');
        return true;
    }
}

code_snippet:
<?php
class WebhookReceiver {
    public function receivePayment($payload) {
        $conn = new PDO('sqlite:payments.db');
        $stmt = $conn->prepare('INSERT INTO payments (amount, status) VALUES (?, ?)');
        $stmt->execute([$payload['amount'], $payload['status']]);
        return 'Payment processed';
    }
}

<?php
class OrderRepository {
    private $database;
    
    public function __construct($db) {
        $this->database = $db;
    }
    
    public function saveOrder($order) {
        return $this->database->query('INSERT INTO orders VALUES (?)', [$order]);
    }
}

    handleEmailBounce($bounceData);
    return ['acknowledged' => true];
});

<?php
$router->get('/status/ftp', function() {
    $connection = ftp_connect('localhost', 21);
    $status = $connection ? 'connected' : 'failed';
    if ($connection) ftp_close($connection);
    return json_encode(['ftp_status' => $status]);
});

code_snippet:
<?php
class FileUploader {
    public function uploadToSftp($localFile, $remotePath) {
        $sftpConnection = ssh2_connect('sftp.company.com', 22);
        ssh2_auth_password($sftpConnection, 'user', 'pass');
        $sftpResource = ssh2_sftp($sftpConnection);
        return file_put_contents("ssh2.sftp://$sftpResource$remotePath", file_get_contents($localFile));
    }
}

<?php

require_once 'vendor/autoload.php';

use PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase;
use GraphQL\GraphQL;
use GraphQL\Type\Schema;

class GraphQLTestCase extends TestCase
{
    protected $schema;

    protected function setUp(): void
    {
        $this->schema = new Schema([]);
    }
}

<?php
function syncCustomerData($customerId) {
    $curl = curl_init();
    curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://crm.salesforce.com/api/v1/customers');
    curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POST, true);
    curl_setopt($curl, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode(['id' => $customerId]));
    $result = curl_exec($curl);
    curl_close($curl);
    return $result;
}

class ReportScheduler {
    public function scheduleDailyReport() {
        $cron = new CronExpression('0 2 * * *');
        $reportData = $this->generateReport();
        $this->emailService->send($reportData, 'daily-report@company.com');
        return $cron->getNextRunDate();

function validateTaxNumber($taxId, $country) {
    $wsdlUrl = 'http://tax-validation-service.eu/validate.wsdl';

<?php
function handleSSEConnection($request) {
    header('Content-Type: text/event-stream');
    header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *');
    $counter = 0;
    while ($counter < 10) {
        echo "id: $counter\n";
        echo "data: Update #$counter\n\n";
        $counter++;
        flush();
    }
}

<?php
class WebhookProcessor {
    public function forwardToSSEGateway($webhookData) {
        $payload = ['event_type' => 'server-sent-events', 'payload' => $webhookData];
        $context = stream_context_create([
            'http' => [
                'method' => 'POST',
                'header' => 'Content-Type: application/json',
                'content' => json_encode($payload)
            ]
        ]);
        return file_get_contents('https://gateway.example.com/sse', false, $context);
    }
}

code_snippet:
require 'dalli'

class ProductCatalog
  def initialize
    @memcached = Dalli::Client.new('localhost:11211')
  end

  def find_product(sku)
    product_key = "product:#{sku}"
    cached_product = @memcached.get(product_key)
    
    unless cached_product
      cached_product = Product.find_by(sku: sku)
      @memcached.set(product_key, cached_product, 1800)
    end
    
    cached_product
  end
end

class BackupManager
  def initialize
    require 'net/ftp'
    @server = 'backup.internal.com'
    @username = ENV['FTP_USER']
  end

  def backup_database(dump_file)
    ftp_client = Net::FTP.new(@server)
    ftp_client.login(@username, ENV['FTP_PASS'])
    ftp_client.put(dump_file, "backups/#{Time.now.strftime('%Y%m%d')}.sql")
  end
end

  include OrderProtos
  
  def create_order(request, _call)

      customer_id: request.customer_id,
      items: request.items.map(&:to_h)

  end

class UserController < ApplicationController
  def create
    # Handle REST API user creation endpoint
    user = User.new(user_params)
    if user.save
      render json: user, status: :created
    else

    end
  end

class NotificationConsumer
  def start
    kafka_consumer = Kafka::Consumer.new(
      brokers: ['kafka-1:9092', 'kafka-2:9092'],
      group_id: 'notification-service'
    )
    
    kafka_consumer.subscribe('user.notifications')
    kafka_consumer.each_message do |msg|
      send_notification(msg.value)
    end
  end
end

module EventStreamer
  def self.stream_analytics_data(event_payload)
    kafka_config = {
      'bootstrap.servers' => 'analytics-kafka.internal:9092',
      'client.id' => 'ruby-producer'
    }
    producer = Rdkafka::Config.new(kafka_config).producer
    producer.produce(topic: 'analytics_events', payload: event_payload)
    producer.flush
  end
end

require 'net/http'
require 'rexml/document'

def send_customer_data(customer_info)
  envelope = build_soap_envelope(customer_info)
  uri = URI('https://crm.external.com/soap/customer')
  http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
  http.use_ssl = true
  response = http.post(uri.path, envelope, {'Content-Type' => 'text/xml'})
  parse_response(response.body)
end

class EventsController < ApplicationController
  include ActionController::Live

  def stream
    response.headers['Content-Type'] = 'text/event-stream'
    response.headers['Cache-Control'] = 'no-cache'
    
    10.times do |i|
      response.stream.write "data: Event #{i}\n\n"
      sleep 1
    end
    response.stream.close
  end
end

require 'net/http'

class EventPublisher
  def broadcast_sse_event(event_data)
    uri = URI('https://api.eventstream.com/sse/publish')
    http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
    http.use_ssl = true
    response = http.post(uri.path, event_data.to_json)
    response.code == '200'
  end
end

code_snippet:
import cats.effect.IO
import courier._

object ReportGenerator {
  def sendMonthlyReport(recipients: List[String]): IO[Unit] = {
    val reportData = generateReport()
    val smtpConfig = Smtp("smtp.company.org", 587)
      .auth(true)
      .as("reports@company.org", "password123")
      .startTls(true)()
    
    val envelope = Envelope
      .from("reports@company.org".addr)
      .to(recipients.map(_.addr): _*)
      .subject("Monthly Analytics Report")
      .content(Text(reportData))
    
    IO.fromFuture(IO(smtpConfig.send(envelope)))
  }
}
